page.title: 17THE UNDER FIVES.
page.content: There are two organisations which cater for the under fives in Bellingham,the play group for over threes,and the toddlers club for the under threes. {Toddlers Club. The main object of the club is to give the youngsters the opportunity to learn to mix,and to form friendship bonds which may last to high school age.They have many toys which they are encouraged to use,but they also have the opportunity to look at books.At the moment there are 30 toddlers and 18 mothers who participate. {Play Group. The play group has 22 members,one assistant to the leader, and two mothers who help each week.The group has toys and books,but the books are used more actively to encourage the children to learn.
